definition.name: Bundle comparison
definition.description: Compare the bundle size between the base branch and the current branch

inputs.name: current-stats-json-path
inputs.description: The path to the current stats.json file

inputs.name: base-stats-json-path
inputs.description: The path to the base stats.json file

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: An optional addition to the title, which also helps key comments, useful if running more than 1 copy of this action

inputs.name: describe-assets
inputs.description:
Optional specification describing asset changes. May be one of the convenience
keywords "all", "none", or "changed-only" (for all except the unchanged section), OR
a string of space-separated section names, e.g. "added bigger unchanged", where
all sections are:
  - added
  - removed
  - bigger
  - smaller
  - unchanged
If not provided, "all" is used (equivalent to "added removed bigger smaller unchanged")

evidence.reasoning: This action is focused on comparing bundle sizes, which is a key aspect of code quality and performance testing. It helps developers ensure that changes do not negatively impact the size of their bundles.
